items.text: fuller, and he lofts this on the front foot wide of mid off, he sliced this, didn't time it and gets a couple
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, 2 runs

items.preText: The skipper, Mashrafe Mortaza returns. Around the wicket
items.text: good length, wide of off, he sits back and runs this down to third man
items.postText: Abhilash Munshi: "This is Shakib at his best... Unless you rattle him early.. he gets into a rhythm that not many can break out from...."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Miller, 1 run

items.text: he shapes early and ramps a length ball fine of fine leg! Great sill again. It was premeditated but executed to perfection.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length, outside off, he punches this straight to cover and is frustrated he couldn't find the gap
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, no run

items.text: good length on leg, he's whipping this through square leg to the sweeper
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: good length, outside off, 120kph, he opens the face on the front foot and runs it to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Miller, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, on off, he works this off the back foot to long on
items.postText: Tasmeem: "Need some good overs from Mashrafe. So far he has being missing his lengths. Not accustomed to seeing this."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to du Plessis, 1 run

items.preText: Good news. Mehidy is back on and back into the attack
items.text: looped up outside off, he gets back and across and works this to the gap at square leg and runs brilliantly to pick up two
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to du Plessis, 2 runs

items.text: tossed up higher, he clips this to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: drifting into leg stump, he works this behind square
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Miller, 1 run

items.text: Bowled him! Faf what have you done? Beautiful delivery from Mehidy. He tossed it up higher and slower, lured the South African skipper down the track, he tried to launch it down the ground, it gripped and spun through the gate and crashed into leg stump to spark wild celebrations from the Bangladesh team and fans
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to du Plessis, OUT

dismissal.text: F du Plessis  b Mehidy Hasan Miraz 62 (64m 53b 5x4 1x6) SR: 116.98

items.preText: Rassie van der Dussen in at No.5. Leg slip in
items.text: tossed up outside off, he stretches forward and defends
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: flatter outside off, no turn, he defends with an open face to point
items.postText: South Africa's win percentage has dropped from 38 to 29 with that wicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: good length, he drives on the up down through mid on
items.postText: Mark: "Now things get interesting! RRR closing on 8 and two new batsmen at the crease. Another wicket now and you would suspect that South Africa might start to fold."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Miller, 1 run

items.text: fuller, he drives neatly to the gap at deep cover and they get an easy two with good placement and running
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to van der Dussen, 2 runs

items.text: good length, 116kph, slower ball, he stands and drives straight to cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: back of a length, 118kph, he stands tall and defends into the off side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: good length, 126kph, wide of off, he drives through cover to the long boundary and again the sweeper can't prevent two. The skipper was none too pleased
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to van der Dussen, 2 runs

items.text: angled into leg, he glances neatly wide of fine leg for another easy two
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to van der Dussen, 2 runs

items.text: drifting outside leg, he whips this through forward square but they only get one this time as the sweeper races in
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Miller, 1 run

items.text: shorter length, he hammers this off the back foot but can't beat cover
items.postText: Stuart: "Any committed cricket lover cannot be watching this and nothing wondering, but what if ABdV was playing? Massive shame that he's not there. "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: full toss, he misses out, mistimes it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, no run

items.text: good length outside off, he punches off the back foot to deep point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on off, he defends this manipulating wide of cover for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Miller, 1 run

items.text: tossed high outside off, he drives firmly but can't beat cover
items.postText: Usman Nazir: "Arent SA underestimating skills of van .. he is highly skilled.. excellent defence .. can play big innings.. and can accelerate when requires .. i ll love him batting at 3 or 4 "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to van der Dussen, no run
